levels.description:
Immediately gains <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP and all ground enemies around the Tactical Point are put to <$ba.sleep>Sleep</> for <@ba.vup>{blkngt_s_2.duration}</> seconds; For the next <@ba.vup>{blkngt_s_2.duration}</> seconds, the Slumberfoot uses AoE Arts attacks that deal <@ba.vup>{blkngt_s_2.atk_scale:0%}</> damage against <$ba.sleep>Sleeping</> enemies
<@ba.rem>Can store 1 charge</>
